config.persona: string (required) - The bot's personality and character description
config.botthesis: string (required) - The bot's core thesis or purpose
config.fallback_message: string | null - Message shown when bot cannot respond (optional)

settings.business_description: string | null - Description of the business (optional)
settings.product_name: string (required) - Name of the product or service
settings.product_description: string | null - Description of the product or service (optional)
settings.support_email: string | null - Support email address (must be valid email format, optional)
settings.supported_languages: string[] (required, min 1) - Array of supported language codes (e.g., ['en', 'es'])

runtime_settings.rate_limit_per_min: number (default: 60, min: 1, max: 1000) - Rate limit per minute (read-only)
runtime_settings.api_calls_this_month: number (default: 0, min: 0) - Counter for API calls made this month (read-only)

ui_settings.chatbot_name: string (required) - Display name of the chatbot
ui_settings.welcome_message: string (required) - Welcome message shown to users
ui_settings.quick_questions: string[] (max 5) - Array of quick question prompts (up to 5)
ui_settings.support_info: string | null - Support information or contact details
ui_settings.auto_open_delay_ms: number (min: 0) - Delay in milliseconds before auto-opening chat (0 = disabled)
ui_settings.auto_greet_on_open: boolean - Whether to automatically greet when chat opens
ui_settings.ask_email_before_chat: boolean - Whether to require email before starting chat
ui_settings.persist_chat: boolean (default: true) - Whether to persist chat history
ui_settings.show_timestamps: boolean (default: true) - Whether to show timestamps on messages
